creator: Voovo Hungary
descriptionHtml:
It has always been extremely time consuming to create flashcards… NOT ANYMORE! Voovo lets you create 150+ flashcards in under 30 seconds!

HOW CAN WE BE SO FAST?

Voovo is the first application to use several innovative ways to create flashcards. We primarily use text locating/analysing algorithms and VOICE to speed up the process. So far people could only use text and picture flashcards, which take a significant amount of time to make and can't be created simultaneously while reading the text book.

WHAT DO YOU GET WITH VOOVO?

- 3 innovative ways to create flashcards + simple flashcard creation.

Voice card

Our voice card is an innovative new way to make flashcards. Instead of typing in the question and the answer, you can use your voice to do the same. Making voice cards is 3-5 times faster than creating simple flashcards.

Diagram cards

Diagram cards are the fastest way to make flashcards. This method allows you to make more than 300 cards in just one minute. You simply take a picture of a diagram, using a text locating algorithm we find all the text on it, we put it into text boxes, and you can select the information you want to hide. This way you can reach 300+ flashcards per one minute.

Fill in the blank cards

In fill in the blank cards, instead of writing the answer, you choose the words, that you want to hide in the question. Very useful for definitions or memorising paragraphs. Furthermore with the text analysing algorithm we use, it takes a few second to import any text from a photo of a definition or paragraph and then you simply select the words you want to hide.

Simple flashcards

The very well known question and answer combination. You can add text, images to your flashcards.

- Unlimited file system where you can easily organise subjects and topics.

- Minimalistic, easy to use design.

- Built in spaced repetition algorithm to maximise your retention.

- A cloud storage system to never lose your studying material and to possibly study on multiple devices.

INSIGHT:

Studies show that connecting an information to something else in your brain helps you to remember that information for much longer. To every card in Voovo you can add an insight, this can be little story that helps you remember or just a word that instantly triggers that memory in your brain… Furthermore you can use insight to add example sentences, additional information or just some fun facts to any flashcard of your choice.

STUDYING WITH VOOVO:

You can start a study session at any level of our file system. This means you can study very braud or extremely specific topics. The application asks you to recall the information on each flashcard, you can check the answer afterwards. Once you see what the answer is, there are 4 options to choose from, each representing a level of knowledge. The algorithm is based on your interactions, the cards you know better will be recalled less frequently, the cards you struggle with will pop up more often.

THE ALGORITHM WE USE…

Memory studies have shown that spaced repetition is one of the best ways to build up memory and increase recall rates. This algorithm helps to ensure that the flashcard is shown at the perfect moment, allowing you to “top up” your memory at just the right time. Customer reviews suggest that the best spaced repetition algorithm out there is Anki’s, that is the one we chose to use.

Even though active recall and spaced repetition are the -scientifically proven- two most efficient learning strategies, very few students take advantage of them. The easiest way to practice these two strategies is by creating and using flashcards.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Your ideas, our solutions!

At Voovo we exceptionally value our customers ideas and feature requests.

This week we come with 5 new features, all of them are requested or suggested by YOU: folder and deck optional colours and icons, search in folders and decks, duplicate your cards, reverse your cards.

There are additional small new features as well, such as repeating missed flashcards or the flashcard count.

Latest update includes bug fixes as well.

You simply take a picture of a diagram, using a text locating algorithm we find all the text on it, we put it into text boxes, and you can select the information you want to hide. This way you can reach 300+ flashcards per one minute.

Fill in the blank cards

In fill in the blank cards, instead of writing the answer, you choose the words, that you want to hide in the question. Very useful for definitions or memorising paragraphs. Furthermore with the text analysing algorithm we use, it takes a few second to import any text from a photo of a definition or paragraph and then you simply select the words you want to hide.

Simple flashcards

The very well known question and answer combination. You can add text, images to your flashcards.

- Unlimited file system where you can easily organise subjects and topics.

- Minimalistic, easy to use design.

- Built in spaced repetition algorithm to maximise your retention.

- A cloud storage system to never lose your studying material and to possibly study on multiple devices.

INSIGHT:

Studies show that connecting an information to something else in your brain helps you to remember that information for much longer. To every card in Voovo you can add an insight, this can be little story that helps you remember or just a word that instantly triggers that memory in your brain… Furthermore you can use insight to add example sentences, additional information or just some fun facts to any flashcard of your choice.

STUDYING WITH VOOVO:

You can start a study session at any level of our file system. This means you can study very braud or extremely specific topics. The application asks you to recall the information on each flashcard, you can check the answer afterwards. Once you see what the answer is, there are 4 options to choose from, each representing a level of knowledge. The algorithm is based on your interactions, the cards you know better will be recalled less frequently, the cards you struggle with will pop up more often.

THE ALGORITHM WE USE…

Memory studies have shown that spaced repetition is one of the best ways to build up memory and increase recall rates. This algorithm helps to ensure that the flashcard is shown at the perfect moment, allowing you to “top up” your memory at just the right time. Customer reviews suggest that the best spaced repetition algorithm out there is Anki’s, that is the one we chose to use.

Even though active recall and spaced repetition are the -scientifically proven- two most efficient learning strategies, very few students take advantage of them. The easiest way to practice these two strategies is by creating and using flashcards.

The very well known question and answer combination. You can add text, images to your flashcards.

- Unlimited file system where you can easily organise subjects and topics.

- Minimalistic, easy to use design.

- Built in spaced repetition algorithm to maximise your retention.

- A cloud storage system to never lose your studying material and to possibly study on multiple devices.

INSIGHT:

Studies show that connecting an information to something else in your brain helps you to remember that information for much longer. To every card in Voovo you can add an insight, this can be little story that helps you remember or just a word that instantly triggers that memory in your brain… Furthermore you can use insight to add example sentences, additional information or just some fun facts to any flashcard of your choice.

STUDYING WITH VOOVO:

You can start a study session at any level of our file system. This means you can study very braud or extremely specific topics. The application asks you to recall the information on each flashcard, you can check the answer afterwards. Once you see what the answer is, there are 4 options to choose from, each representing a level of knowledge. The algorithm is based on your interactions, the cards you know better will be recalled less frequently, the cards you struggle with will pop up more often.

THE ALGORITHM WE USE…

Memory studies have shown that spaced repetition is one of the best ways to build up memory and increase recall rates. This algorithm helps to ensure that the flashcard is shown at the perfect moment, allowing you to “top up” your memory at just the right time. Customer reviews suggest that the best spaced repetition algorithm out there is Anki’s, that is the one we chose to use.

Even though active recall and spaced repetition are the -scientifically proven- two most efficient learning strategies, very few students take advantage of them. The easiest way to practice these two strategies is by creating and using flashcards.

Simple flashcards

- Unlimited file system where you can easily organise subjects and topics.

title: Voovo - Fastest way to study

creator: Voovo Hungary
descriptionHtml:
Download Voovo, create study cards faster than ever and (f)ace your exams!
Countless studies show that active recall and spaced repetition are the two most effective learning strategies to memorize new information. Using flashcards for studying is the easiest way to utilize these methods, however, it has always been extremely time consuming to make flashcards… NOT ANYMORE! Voovo takes the concept of study cards to another level and lets you create 150+ flashcards in under 30 seconds!

WHAT IS VOOVO?
Voovo is an innovative free study app for school and uni, which helps you study fast by empowering you to create flashcards in a blink of an eye. Whether you need to study medicine, understand math or memorize words in a foreign language, Voovo is the best flashcard app for you. Make a study plan, create your deck of flashcards easily and memorize everything.

Voovo is the first application to use SEVERAL INNOVATIVE FLASHCARDS:

1. VOICE CARD
Creating text and picture cards takes forever and they can't be created simultaneously while reading the study notes. Instead of typing in the question and the answer, just use your voice and make flashcards fast: 3-5 times faster than with the regular method.

2. DIAGRAM CARD
This is the fastest way to create a study card. This method allows you to make more than 300 in just 1 minute. You simply take a picture of a diagram and Voovo does all the rest: using text analyzing algorithm, we find all the text on the picture, put it into boxes and your flashcards are ready to be revised.

3. FILL IN THE BLANKS CARD
Instead of typing in the answer, simply choose the words you want to hide in the question. Very useful for definitions or memorizing paragraphs. You can create fill in the blanks easily: simply take a picture of the textbook, Voovo scans the text for you automatically and you are ready to go.

4. SIMPLE FLASHCARD
The very well-known question and answer combination. Add text, images to your flashcards and memorize anything you want.

WHAT YOU GET WITH VOOVO:
-Use our innovative flashcards, study faster than ever and ace your exams.
-Learn as you like with our different study methods.
-Organize your subjects and topics in the file system.
-Enjoy the minimalistic, easy to use interface.
-Make your study plan to help efficient learning and progress.
-Be reminded anytime you need to revise your cards/material/study notes.
-Easily share your deck of flashcards with your friends.
-Import study material and existing cards from other study apps.
-Invite your friends and USE OUR PREMIUM FEATURES FOR FREE.

THE ALGORITHM WE USE…
Memory studies have shown that spaced repetition is the best ways to build up memory and increase recall rates. This algorithm helps to ensure that the flashcard is shown at the perfect moment, allowing you to “top up” your memory at just the right time. Customer reviews suggest that the best spaced repetition algorithm out there is Anki’s, that is the one we chose to use.

SIGN UP NOW FOR FREE AND USE THE FASTEST FLASHCARDS IN THE WORLD!

You simply take a picture of a diagram and Voovo does all the rest: using text analyzing algorithm, we find all the text on the picture, put it into boxes and your flashcards are ready to be revised.

3. FILL IN THE BLANKS CARD
Instead of typing in the answer, simply choose the words you want to hide in the question. Very useful for definitions or memorizing paragraphs. You can create fill in the blanks easily: simply take a picture of the textbook, Voovo scans the text for you automatically and you are ready to go.

4. SIMPLE FLASHCARD
The very well-known question and answer combination. Add text, images to your flashcards and memorize anything you want.

WHAT YOU GET WITH VOOVO:
-Use our innovative flashcards, study faster than ever and ace your exams.
-Learn as you like with our different study methods.
-Organize your subjects and topics in the file system.
-Enjoy the minimalistic, easy to use interface.
-Make your study plan to help efficient learning and progress.
-Be reminded anytime you need to revise your cards/material/study notes.
-Easily share your deck of flashcards with your friends.
-Import study material and existing cards from other study apps.
-Invite your friends and USE OUR PREMIUM FEATURES FOR FREE.

THE ALGORITHM WE USE…
Memory studies have shown that spaced repetition is the best ways to build up memory and increase recall rates. This algorithm helps to ensure that the flashcard is shown at the perfect moment, allowing you to “top up” your memory at just the right time. title:
AI Study Flashcards: Voovo
4.0.3

creator: Voovo Hungary
descriptionHtml:
Download Voovo, maak sneller dan ooit flashcards en haal je examens!

Talloze onderzoeken tonen aan dat actieve herinnering en gespreide herhaling de twee meest effectieve leerstrategieën zijn om nieuwe informatie te onthouden. Studeren met digitale flashcards is de gemakkelijkste manier om deze methoden te gebruiken, maar het is altijd extreem tijdrovend geweest om flashcards te maken... NIET MEER! Voovo tilt het concept van studiekaarten naar een ander niveau en laat je in minder dan een minuut meer dan 150 flashcards maken!

WAT IS VOOVO?

Voovo is een innovatieve studie-app voor school en universiteit, die je helpt sneller te studeren door je in staat te stellen in een oogwenk flashcards te maken. Of je nu medicijnen moet studeren, wiskunde moet begrijpen of woorden in een vreemde taal moet onthouden, Voovo is de beste flashcard-app voor jou.

Voovo is de eerste applicatie die VERSCHILLENDE INNOVATIEVE MANIEREN GEBRUIKT OM FLASHCARDS TE MAKEN:


1. OCR-diagramkaarten

Dit is de snelste manier om een geheugenkaart te maken. Met deze methode kunt u meer dan honderden binnen een minuut verdienen. Je maakt gewoon een foto van een diagram en Voovo doet de rest: met behulp van algoritmen voor tekstanalyse vinden we alle relevante tekst op de foto, we stoppen het in vakken, je kunt kiezen wat je wilt onthouden en je flashcards zijn klaar om te gebruiken. herzien worden.


2. STEMKAARTEN

Het maken van eenvoudige, algemene flashcards duurt een eeuwigheid en ze kunnen niet tegelijkertijd worden gemaakt terwijl u uw studieaantekeningen leest. In plaats van de vraag en het antwoord in te typen, gebruik je gewoon je stem en maak je flashcards snel: 3-5 keer sneller dan met de reguliere methode.


3. VUL DE LEGE KAARTEN IN

In plaats van het antwoord in te typen, kiest u gewoon de woorden die u in de vraag wilt verbergen. Erg handig voor definities of het onthouden van paragrafen. U kunt eenvoudig de lege plekken invullen: maak gewoon een foto van het leerboek, Voovo scant de tekst automatisch voor u, u kiest de woorden die u wilt verbergen en u bent klaar om te gaan.


4. EENVOUDIGE FLASHKAARTEN

De zeer bekende vraag- en antwoordcombinatie. Voeg tekst en afbeeldingen toe aan je flashcards en onthoud alles wat je maar wilt.


5. Ai FLASH-KAARTEN

U kunt automatisch flashcards genereren van elke tekst, ongeacht of deze is getypt of gescand. U kunt Voovo Ai vragen om een automatisch antwoord te genereren op de tekst die u invoert, of een automatische vraag genereren. Sterker nog, u kunt volledige alinea's of definities invoeren en Voovo Ai genereert automatische vraag- en antwoordcombinaties voor u.

WAT JE KRIJGT BIJ VOOVO:

- Je kunt het in gesplitste weergave gebruiken met je favoriete app voor het maken van notities en flashcards maken met Drag & Drop rechtstreeks vanuit je notities en boeken.
- Gebruik onze innovatieve flashcards, studeer sneller dan ooit en haal je examens.
- Leer zoals je wilt met onze verschillende studie-algoritmen: herhaling op afstand en snel leren.
- Organiseer uw onderwerpen en onderwerpen in een eindeloos bestandssysteem.
- Geniet van de minimalistische, gebruiksvriendelijke interface.
- U wordt er op elk moment aan herinnerd dat u uw kaarten/materiaal/studienotities moet herzien.
- Deel eenvoudig je kaartspel met je vrienden.
- Importeer studiemateriaal en bestaande kaarten uit andere studie-apps, zoals Anki en Quizlet.

HET ALGORITME DAT WIJ GEBRUIKEN…

Geheugenstudies hebben aangetoond dat herhaling op afstand de beste manier is om geheugen op te bouwen en de herinneringsfrequentie te verhogen. Dit algoritme helpt ervoor te zorgen dat de flashcard op het perfecte moment wordt weergegeven, zodat u uw geheugen op het juiste moment kunt "opwaarderen". Klantrecensies suggereren dat het best gespreide herhalingsalgoritme dat er is, dat van Anki is, dat is degene die we hebben gekozen om te gebruiken.

SCHRIJF NU GRATIS IN EN GEBRUIK DE SNELSTE FLASHCARDS TER WERELD!

title:
Voovo: AI Spaced Repetition
4.0.4

creator: Voovo Hungary
descriptionHtml:
Download Voovo, create study cards faster than ever and (f)ace your exams!
Countless studies show that active recall and spaced repetition are the two most effective learning strategies to memorize new information. Using flashcards for studying is the easiest way to utilize these methods, however, it has always been extremely time consuming to make flashcards… NOT ANYMORE! Voovo takes the concept of study cards to another level and lets you create 150+ flashcards in under 30 seconds!

WHAT IS VOOVO?
Voovo is an innovative free study app for school and uni, which helps you study fast by empowering you to create flashcards in a blink of an eye. Whether you need to study medicine, understand math or memorize words in a foreign language, Voovo is the best flashcard app for you. Make a study plan, create your deck of flashcards easily and memorize everything.

Voovo is the first application to use SEVERAL INNOVATIVE FLASHCARDS:

1. VOICE CARD
Creating text and picture cards takes forever and they can't be created simultaneously while reading the study notes. Instead of typing in the question and the answer, just use your voice and make flashcards fast: 3-5 times faster than with the regular method.

2. DIAGRAM CARD
This is the fastest way to create a study card. This method allows you to make more than 300 in just 1 minute. You simply take a picture of a diagram and Voovo does all the rest: using text analyzing algorithm, we find all the text on the picture, put it into boxes and your flashcards are ready to be revised.

3. FILL IN THE BLANKS CARD
Instead of typing in the answer, simply choose the words you want to hide in the question. Very useful for definitions or memorizing paragraphs. You can create fill in the blanks easily: simply take a picture of the textbook, Voovo scans the text for you automatically and you are ready to go.

4. SIMPLE FLASHCARD
The very well-known question and answer combination. Add text, images to your flashcards and memorize anything you want.

WHAT YOU GET WITH VOOVO:
-Use our innovative flashcards, study faster than ever and ace your exams.
-Learn as you like with our different study methods.
-Organize your subjects and topics in the file system.
-Enjoy the minimalistic, easy to use interface.
-Make your study plan to help efficient learning and progress.
-Be reminded anytime you need to revise your cards/material/study notes.
-Easily share your deck of flashcards with your friends.
-Import study material and existing cards from other study apps.
-Invite your friends and USE OUR PREMIUM FEATURES FOR FREE.

THE ALGORITHM WE USE…
Memory studies have shown that spaced repetition is the best ways to build up memory and increase recall rates. This algorithm helps to ensure that the flashcard is shown at the perfect moment, allowing you to “top up” your memory at just the right time. Customer reviews suggest that the best spaced repetition algorithm out there is Anki’s, that is the one we chose to use.

SIGN UP NOW FOR FREE AND USE THE FASTEST FLASHCARDS IN THE WORLD!
